Y = VL_SIGMOID(X) returns 

 Y = 1 ./ (1 + EXP(X)) ;
Remark

Useful properties of the sigmoid function are:

  • 1 - VL_SIGMOID(X) = VL_SIGMOID(-X)

  • Centered sigmoid: 2 * VL_SIGMOID(X) - 1 ;

  • VL_SIGMOID(X) = (EXP(X/2) - EXP(X/2)) / (EXP(X/2) + EXP(X/2))

See also: VL_DSIGMOID(), VL_HELP().
